channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Uber launches an ‘AV Labs’ division to gather driving data for robotaxi partners
item.description: Uber is not developing its own robotaxis again; instead it plans to collect and offer data. It's a bet that more volume will help autonomous vehicle partners solve the weirdest edge cases.

item.title: Garmin might finally be launching its Whoop competitor as the Cirqa smart band leaks on its own website
item.description: Eagle-eyed Garmin users on Reddit managed to screenshot a leaked smart band – on Garmin's own website.

item.title: « Windows 11 est sans doute dans le pire état de son histoire » : pourquoi Microsoft gâche la sortie des nouvelles puces Intel Panther Lake
item.description: Et si le principal ennemi du PC était Windows 11 ? L'état désastreux de l'OS de Microsoft pourrait bien entacher le lancement de nouveaux PC en ce début d'année 2026.

item.title: TikTok’s new US venture is in trouble – here are the 3 privacy-first apps people are flocking to instead
item.description: TikTok users are deleting the app in droves over privacy concerns, while smaller rivals are seeing a big boost in numbers.

item.title: Google Photos now lets you describe how to transform images into video
item.description: Google is giving Photos users more control over the app's generative AI photo-to-video feature. Google Photos now supports text prompts for video generation, according to the update announcement on Monday, allowing users to describe the specific movement, style, or effect they want to see when bringing still images to life. Text prompts join the existing […]...

item.title: Skyrim, Cyberpunk 2077… Modder vos jeux sur Steam Deck sera bientôt radicalement plus simple
item.description: Nexus Mods vient d'annoncer le futur support de son application Vortex aux machines tournant sur SteamOS. De quoi faciliter grandement le modding sur Steam Deck et la future Steam Machine.

item.title: Neil Young takes swipe at Trump and gives his entire music catalog to Greenland for free — and says his ‘music will never be available on Amazon, as long as it is owned by Bezos’
item.description: Neil Young is standing in solidarity with Greenland by offering his music to residents for free, and he also had some things to say about Bezos.

item.title: What a deal! HP’s 15.6-inch touchscreen Windows 11 laptop is under $400 and packs an Intel Core i5-1334U processor, 16GB RAM, and a 512GB SSD — but at this price, it could sell out at any moment
item.description: HP’s 15.6-inch touchscreen laptop is under $400 at Best Buy and packs an Intel Core i5-1334U processor, 16GB RAM, and a 512GB SSD.

item.title: Smart Play : Lego lance cinq nouveaux kits Star Wars… mais sans la Smart Brick
item.description: Après les premières annonces de sets Lego Star Wars avec sa nouvelle Smart Brick, Lego a présenté ce mardi de nouveaux kits compatibles : Cantina, Faucon Millenium ou AT-AT.

item.title: Nike investigating mega security breach as hackers claim to have stolen 1.4TB of data
item.description: WorldLeaks adds Nike to its data leak site, but did it steal customer data?

item.title: The AirTag 2 leaves some iPhones behind – here's the full compatibility list and which models get its best upgrade
item.description: The extended precision tracking feature on the new AirTag also requires a recent iPhone to work properly.

item.title: This simple Apple Maps setting solved a key problem for me — I can’t believe no one’s talking about it
item.description: Apple Maps can automatically locate your parked car, even if you don’t remember where you left it.

item.title: The DJI Avata 2 is 'the easy option' for getting into FPV drones — and right now this highly-rated model is at a record-low price
item.description: Looking to get into FPV drones? The DJI Avata 2 is a superb option for beginners, and right now Amazon has a range of record-low prices on a range of combos.

item.title: The DJI Mini 5 Pro Fly More Combo has hit its best-ever price at Amazon — save $500 right now
item.description: The DJI Mini 5 Pro Fly More Combo is on sale at Amazon for $1,099, down from the normal price of $1,599. That's a 31% discount.

item.title: The Morning After: Apple's new louder, high-precision AirTag
item.description: Between the new Macs, iPhones and rumored AI gadgets, Apple surprised us with an upgraded, second-generation AirTag. It has Apple’s latest Ultra Wideband chip — the same one used in the iPhone 17 lineup and the Apple Watch Ultra 3. It also uses Precision Finding to reach items up to 50 percent further away than the previous AirTag model. This feature will now work with any Apple Watch Series 9, Ultra 2 or newer.TMAAppleApple says the new tag is 50 percent louder and features a “distinctive new chime.” So you can show off that you’ve got the new kind of AirTag. Sadly, there’s still no keyring h...

item.title: The best sex and dating apps for hooking up
item.description: Looking for no strings attached sex? We've lined up a selection of sex apps for finding something casual.

item.title: Faille critique de WhatsApp : Google révèle comment un simple fichier peut vous piéger
item.description: Des chercheurs de Google Project Zero ont débusqué une faille critique sur WhatsApp. Dans la version Android de la messagerie, une vulnérabilité peut permettre à un pirate de forcer le téléchargement d’un média piégé sur le smartphone de sa victime. Meta ayant omis de déployer une mise à jour pour corriger intégralement la faille, les chercheurs ont pris la décision de divulguer publiquement leurs découvertes....

item.title: The Smart Light Bulbs Worth Buying in 2026: Cync, Meross, Tapo
item.description: If you’re new to smart home tech, light bulbs are an affordable, low-commitment place to start.

item.title: Kaitlyn Dever Is Ready for the Abby-Centric ‘Last of Us’ Season 3
item.description: The 'Booksmart' star is getting ready to film the next season of the hit HBO video game adaptation.

item.title: Roland’s TR-1000 is the ultimate drum machine
item.description: It took way too long, but Roland finally caved and gave the people what they want: a proper analog successor to the iconic TR-808 drum machine. The 808's sound, especially the kick drum, is embedded so deeply in the DNA of modern music that it would be a gross disservice to try and boil its […]

item.title: Stephen Colbert calls BS on Trump administrations response to ICE killing
item.description: Stephen Colbert has responded to nurse Alex Pretti being shot and killed by an ICE agent in Minneapolis on Saturday.

item.title: Magic: The Gathering Final Fantasy booster packs are under $10 at Amazon
item.description: Magic: The Gathering Final Fantasy Play Booster Packs drop to $8.99 at Amazon, their lowest price in 30 days.

item.title: Claude just became a real productivity hub — you can now run tools like Slack and Figma without leaving the chat
item.description: Claude now controls Slack, Figma, and more, and your AI chat just turned into a real workflow hub.

item.title: Score the Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 Classic for its lowest-ever price at Amazon — save $150
item.description: As of Jan. 27, the Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 Classic (46mm) is back to its lowest-ever price of $399.99 at Amazon, 27% off its list price of $549.99.

item.title: Fin de la 2G/3G : même l’Arcep ne peut s’opposer à la fermeture du réseau programmée le 31 mars
item.description: L'extinction de la 2G commencera dans deux mois, d'abord chez Orange dont les premières antennes cesseront d'émettre dans l'unité urbaine Bayonne-Biarritz-Anglet le 31 mars, puis progressivement dans tout l'Hexagone. Un calendrier qui divise mais contre lequel l'Arcep ne peut rien affirme sa présidente.

item.title: 8 Best Laptops (2026), WIRED-Tested and Approved
item.description: Our expert team of laptop testers stand behind these Windows laptops, MacBooks, Chromebooks, and Linux portables.

item.title: All rise for JudgeGPT
item.description: Bridget McCormack is used to correcting judges' work. As the former chief justice on the Michigan Supreme Court, it was her job to review complaints about how judges at the lower courts failed to consider key evidence or rule on certain aspects of a case. In her current job, McCormack is working on a new […]

item.title: This simple robot could drastically speed up data center construction
item.description: Data centers require thousands of holes to anchor server racks. A new robotic drill from DeWalt does the work in a fraction of the time it would take humans. To anchor the long rows of server racks that power the artificial intelligence boom, every data center needs thousands of holes drilled into its concrete floor. It’s a precise part of the construction process that has required workers to bend over with handheld drills for hours at a time grinding meticulously placed holes into thick pads of concrete....

item.title: Newegg is currently selling the powerful Asus Vivobook S 16-inch laptop for just $1,149.99 — save $450 and get Vegas Pro Edit worth $60 for free
item.description: Save $450 on the Asus Vivobook S and get Vegas Pro Edit worth $60 for free in this limited-time offer at Newegg.

item.title: Apple once again puts Android to shame – it just updated the 12-year-old iPhone 5S to set a new record
item.description: Apple has just updated some ancient handsets, ensuring they stay functional for longer.

item.title: Casio's 'Casino Royale' watch gets a Leica-inspired makeover, and it's the ultimate budget accessory for photographers
item.description: The Casio M-Edition watch provides Leica M-Series camera aesthetics for an affordable price

item.title: DJI Mavic 3 Pro : le prix de ce drone doté de 3 caméras est en chute libre pendant les soldes
item.description: Lancé en 2023, le DJI Mavic 3 Pro est un drone haut de gamme qui cumule les atouts : trois caméras, zoom x28, modes automatiques de prises de vue... Un modèle bien complet pour les amateurs de belles images aériennes. Pendant les soldes d'hiver 2026, il vous revient, avec son bundle Cine Premium, à 2 499 euros au lieu de 4 599 euros chez Darty.

item.title: Mayor Zohran Mamdani casually crashes Jimmy Fallons monologue to tell a joke
item.description: Mayor Zohran Mamdani joined Jimmy Fallon during his "Tonight Show" monologue on Monday to tell a joke about the weather.

item.title: Clawdbot AI security risks you need to know before trying it
item.description: Clawdbot is a powerful new AI assistant, but users should be aware of some major security risks before installing it.

item.title: L’Europe veut briser l’emprise de Gemini : pourquoi c’est une chance pour Mistral, Perplexity et même ChatGPT
item.description: L'Europe a compris la leçon. Après avoir laissé Google régner sans partage sur la recherche pendant vingt ans, Bruxelles refuse de refaire la même erreur avec l'IA. La Commission vient de sortir l'artillerie lourde pour démanteler l'avantage déloyal de Gemini au cœur d'Android.

item.title: IA : Bruxelles ouvre un nouveau dossier contre le géant américain Google
item.description: Il ne s'agit pas encore d'une nouvelle enquête officielle visant Google, sous l'égide du DMA, le règlement européen sur les marchés numériques. Mais la Commission européenne prévient Google qu'elle veillera à ce que Android, son système d'exploitation, soit suffisamment ouvert pour que les systèmes d'IA concurrents de Gemini, l'outil d'IA générative maison de Google, puissent exister....

item.title: Vous utilisez Google Agenda ? Cette nouveauté Gemini va vous faire gagner un temps fou
item.description: Vous allez enfin pouvoir programmer une réunion sur Google Agenda sans avoir à jongler avec les calendriers de tout le monde, grâce à Gemini.

item.title: Le télescope James-Webb révèle la mort d’une étoile qui ressemble à l’« œil de Sauron » !
item.description: La nébuleuse de l’Hélice, celle que certains surnomment l’œil de Sauron, a été observée pour la première fois au début des années 1800. Depuis, elle a été vue et revue. Mais aujourd’hui, le télescope spatial James-Webb nous la montre comme jamais.

item.title: Jon Stewart goes scorched earth on Trump administration over ICE killing of Alex Pretti
item.description: Jon Stewart has responded to the shooting of nurse Alex Pretti by ICE in Minneapolis.

item.title: Need a new PC? Beat the RAM crisis price hikes — these Mac mini M4 deals could be the desktop bargain of the year
item.description: Sick of Windows 11? This Mac mini M4 deal could be the smartest purchase you make in 2026.

item.title: Xbox Cloud Gaming’s new design teases the future of Xbox console UI
item.description: Microsoft has started testing a refreshed web experience for Xbox Cloud Gaming that looks even more console-like. Xbox Insiders can now try out the preview UI, which includes updated navigation features, plenty of new animations, and a refreshed design. It all feels like a teaser of what's to come for Xbox consoles in the years […]

item.title: IT teams are being hit with outages due to missing vital alerts
item.description: IT teams are being plagued with false alerts, many are missing or ignoring them entirely – but it can be fixed.

item.title: Rockstar could be trying to prevent even more leaks by making Grand Theft Auto 6 completely digital at launch, report claims
item.description: A new report claims that Rockstar Games will try to prevent more Grand Theft Auto 6 leaks by only releasing the game digitally at launch.

item.title: Face au MacBook Pro M5, ce nouveau PC de MSI sous Intel Panther Lake dégaine un argument de taille
item.description: Peut-on tirer de la grosse puissance sur un 14 pouces ? Le MSI Prestige 14 Flip AI+ le croit, grâce au soutien du Ultra X7 Panther Lake d'Intel.

item.title: How to watch Rybakina vs. Swiatek online for free
item.description: Watch Australian Open for free. Live stream Rybakina vs. Swiatek in the 2026 Australian Open online for free from anywhere in the world.
